MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML11 postcode area of Lanark. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have remotely reset our network and are currently repairing a grounded overhead line and we now expect your supply to be restored by 11:00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:02pm on 24th October 2020.
